availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, shoemaker. Native of Bavaria. Married Susanna Fluck Simon in Jefferson County on June 5, 1854. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1850. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 2, p. 147A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 2, p. 241.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000819600, p. 57 of 793 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com)
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records on Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #7007127, Jefferson County Deaths, Books 5-6, p. 661.
